item.title: Go Awesome

item.title: Go Web Tutorial

item.title: Go Build
item.description: 不顯示console視窗的方法 利用選項: -ldflags -H=windowsgui go build -ldflags -H=windowsgui 如何為您的程式加上詳細內容 這邊一共會教您兩樣東西

item.title: Golang Settings
item.description: Visual studio Keymap name hotkey Open in terminal Alt + C Show in Explorer Alt + W Recent Files Ctrl + E Go to Declaration or Usages Shift + F12 Reformat Code Ctrl + Alt + Enter Split Right Ctrl+W, V Split Down Ctrl+W, S Split and Move Down Ctrl+W,
